list_definition.definition: to put off to another time

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We have delayed publication of the book till the Spring.

list_definition.definition: to keep or stay back or slow down

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I was delayed by the traffic.

list_definition.definition: (something which causes) keeping back or slowing down

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Today’s train services are subject to delays.
